name: Faze Maze
description:
In this game you have to explore procedurally generated mazes in a quiet and peaceful atmosphere, although some dangers will await you. Where without them!

 This project is being developed by the young studio, so any feedback, suggestions and criticism will be warmly accepted and taken into account in further development. Please share your opinion and impressions in the comments to the project in the Oculus Store. Your support is very important to us! 

Get comfortable and enjoy the game!
